TEST.0.title: 2023 North Carolina Division B Regional 6
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

 
 
 
School Name:

Check your team:  ◻ Varsity     ◻ JV1      JV2     ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.318.cipherString: The man of worth is really great without being proud; the mean man is proud without being really great.
CIPHER.318.question: A Chinese proverb has been encoded as an Aristocrat, what does it say? When you have solved it, raise your hand so that the time can be recorded and the solution checked.

CIPHER.341.cipherString: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. Watch your step.
CIPHER.341.question: A quote by Lao Tzu has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that between 4 and 6 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.321.cipherString: Nothing much happens without a dream. For something really great to happen, it takes a really great dream.
CIPHER.321.question: Decode a quote by Robert Greenleaf that has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher and a K1 alphabet. You are told that SHB maps to PEN.

CIPHER.334.question: After solving the cryptarithm ARTIST+EXTRA=VILLAIN decode the phrase 65294 078561923.

CIPHER.331.cipherString: I never think of the future - it comes soon enough.
CIPHER.331.question: A quote by Albert Einstein has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 9=●×, 1=×–, 5=×●, 4=–●, 6=●–

CIPHER.324.cipherString: Believe in Your Heart. Believe in your heart that you're meant to live a life full of passion, purpose, magic and miracles.
CIPHER.324.question: A famous phrase from Roy T. Bennett has been encoded as a Patristocrat using a K1 alphabet. You are told that QVTEC maps to OURHE.

CIPHER.327.cipherString: The visions we offer our children shape the future.
CIPHER.327.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Carl Sagan using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text ends with TURE

CIPHER.325.cipherString: I've had a lot of worries in my life, most of which never happened.
CIPHER.325.question: The following symbols encodes a phrase by Mark Twain using a Baconian alphabet. What does it say?

CIPHER.328.cipherString: Pero es mucho, mucho tiempo De mayo a diciembre; Y los días se acortan cuando llegues a septiembre.
CIPHER.328.question: Solve this Xenocrypt which is a translation of a quote by Maxwell Anderson into Spanish and has been encoded with a K1 alphabet using an English keyword. You are told that BCTE maps to CORT.
CIPHER.328.translation: But it's a long, long while From May to December; And the days grow short When you reach September.

CIPHER.333.cipherString: Change your perspective and change your life
CIPHER.333.question: A quote by Michelle Cook-Hall has been encoded using the FractionatedMorse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with CHANGE YO.

CIPHER.329.cipherString: In the absence of vision, there are nightmares.
CIPHER.329.question: A quote by Bruce Cockburn has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 7=–, 5=×, 3=●, 9=×, 8=●

CIPHER.326.cipherString: From an early age, our mothers teach us to be thankful.
CIPHER.326.question: The following symbols encodes a phrase by Ken Fite using a Baconian alphabet. What does it say?

CIPHER.320.cipherString: Losing your life is not the worst thing that can happen. The worst thing is to lose your reason for living.
CIPHER.320.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Jo Nesbo which ends with the word LIVING.

CIPHER.322.cipherString: The significant problems of our time cannot be solved by the same level of thinking that created them.
CIPHER.322.question: Decode a quote by Albert Einstein that has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher and a K2 alphabet. You are told that it ends with THEM.

CIPHER.335.cipherString: The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
CIPHER.335.question: The following quote by Walter Bagehot needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of WORKS

CIPHER.337.cipherString: From the moment I picked up your book until I put it down, I was convulsed with laughter. Some day I intend reading it.
CIPHER.337.question: Solve this quote from Groucho Marx which has been encoded with the Caesar Cipher.

CIPHER.336.cipherString: We delight in the beauty of the butterfly, but rarely admit the changes it has gone through to achieve that beauty.
CIPHER.336.question: Solve this quote from Maya Angelou which has been encoded with the Caesar Cipher.

CIPHER.332.cipherString: Going back to something is harder than you think.
CIPHER.332.question: A quoteby Mitch Albom has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 1=●×, 3=×–, 6=–●, 8=–×, 4=●–, 2=×●

CIPHER.319.cipherString: They say that not matter how old you become, when you are with your siblings, you revert back to childhood.
CIPHER.319.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Karen White which has the word YOUR in it.

CIPHER.340.cipherString: The present is a point just passed.
CIPHER.340.question: The following quote by David Russell needs to be encoded with the Affine Cipher using a=15 and b=5.

CIPHER.330.cipherString: Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail.
CIPHER.330.question: A quote by Charles Kettering has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 3=●, 6=×, 5=–, 8=×, 0=●, 2=×

CIPHER.339.cipherString: The problem with people is they forget that most of the time it's the small things that count.
CIPHER.339.question: Encode this quote by Jennifer Niven using the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.323.cipherString: Lite travles faster then sound.  This is why some poeple appeer brite until you here them speek.
CIPHER.323.question: Your friend offered you some advice in the form of a Cryptogram, but they are a terrible speller.  You are told it contains the word FASTER.

CIPHER.338.cipherString: Congratulations! Today is your day. You're off to Great Places! You're off and away!
CIPHER.338.question: Solve this quote from Dr. Seuss which has been encoded with the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.342.cipherString: It is safer to search in the maze than to remain in a cheeseless situation
CIPHER.342.question: A quote by Spencer Johnson has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that between 2 and 4 rails were used to encode it.
